item.title: 欧洲的自动驾驶汽车甚至还未起跑
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，Gian Volpicelli 报道欧洲在开发自动驾驶汽车方面的缓慢努力。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Gian Volpicelli reports on Europe’s slow effort to develop self-driving cars.】

item.title: 美国历史上最长停摆造成的持久经济损失
item.description: 美国经济通常会从政府关门中反弹。这次可能有所不同。【原文：The US economy typically rebounds from government shutdowns. This time might be different.】

item.title: 特朗普时代，"赌场式 "市场助推 Robinhood 实现 450% 涨幅
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选以来，Robinhood Markets 公司一直是华尔街最大的赢家之一。但随着对高价股的担忧与日俱增，其天价估值将成为投资者分析周三财报时的首要考虑因素。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. has been one of Wall Street’s biggest winners since Donald Trump’s election victory. But with worries over expensive stocks growing, its sky-high valuation will be front-of-mind as investors parse Wednesday’s results.】

item.title: 尼日利亚对出售国营炼油厂以促进竞争持开放态度
item.description: 尼日利亚对出售国有炼油厂持开放态度，这是为促进由巨型丹格特炼油厂主导的行业竞争所做努力的一部分。【原文：Nigeria is open to selling state-owned refineries as part of an effort to boost competition in the industry, which is dominated by the giant Dangote Refinery.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔驳斥通胀率低于 2% 的观点
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）驳斥了关于欧元区通胀率略低于 2% 目标的说法。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Joachim Nagel rejected suggestions that inflation in the euro zone is settling a little below the 2% goal.】

item.title: 逢低买入者急于按下股票买入键
item.description:
在隔夜交易中，全球科技股主导的抛售已经有所缓和。【原文：

Global tech-led selloff has already moderated in overnight trading.

】

item.title: Nebius 发布可运行开放模型的平台，媲美微软
item.description: 人工智能云服务提供商 Nebius Group NV 正在发布一款新产品，旨在提供开源模型的访问权限以及运行这些模型的计算能力。【原文：Nebius Group NV, an artificial intelligence cloud provider, is releasing a new product meant to offer access to open source models and the computing horsepower to run them — part of a bid to capture a broader piece of the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 对冲基金希望者接受多方协议以寻找现金
item.description: Arnaud de Lasteyrie 准备在 2017 年成立一家对冲基金，他面临着一个艰难的选择：是限制自己只为单一客户运作资金，还是继续追逐以赢得多样化的投资者。【原文：Preparing to launch a hedge fund in 2017, Arnaud de Lasteyrie faced a tough choice: limit himself to running money exclusively for a single client or keep chasing to win a diverse range of investors.】

item.title: 卡塔尔迪亚尔公司计划在埃及进行 35 亿美元现金投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一家卡塔尔国有房地产公司将在埃及进行 35 亿美元的现金投资，这是海湾地区对北非经济的最新支持。【原文：A Qatari state-owned real estate company will make a $3.5 billion cash investment in Egypt, according to people familiar with the matter, in the latest Gulf backing for the North African economy.】

item.title: 一份数十年前的名单限制了美国对欧盟债券期货的参与
item.description: 德意志交易所（Deutsche Börse AG）正在推动美国修改一份已有四十年历史的名单，以便向美国对冲基金开放欧盟的新债券期货。【原文：Deutsche Börse AG is pushing the US to make changes to a four-decade old list to open up the European Union’s new bond futures to American hedge funds.】

item.title: 随着波动性和并购激增，华尔街薪酬将再次攀升
item.description: 随着市场波动刺激交易需求，以及交易活动期待已久的卷土重来，华尔街的奖金预计将连续第二年飙升。【原文：Wall Street bonuses are projected to jump for the second year in a row as market volatility fuels trading demand and dealmaking makes its long-awaited comeback.】

item.title: 南非移动运营商 Cell C 计划首次公开募股 4.13 亿美元
item.description: 南非移动网络运营商 Cell C Holdings Ltd. 正计划在约翰内斯堡进行首次公开募股，这是在股价反弹之际利用非洲交易所资本市场的最新一家公司。【原文：South Africa mobile network operator Cell C Holdings Ltd. is planning an initial public offering in Johannesburg, the latest company to tap the African bourse’s capital markets amid a rally in shares.】

item.title: 比亚迪在英国销量增长六倍，赶超特斯拉
item.description: 比亚迪公司（BYD Co. ）在英国的销售额领先于特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：BYD Co. is building a sales lead over Tesla Inc. in the UK, pulling ahead of the Elon Musk-led company in one of Europe’s biggest markets for plug-in cars.】

item.title: 柬埔寨接受中国储存外国黄金的提议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，柬埔寨将成为首批在中国储存黄金的国家之一，这标志着中国政府在推动发展成为全球金银枢纽方面取得了初步进展。【原文：Cambodia is set to become one of the first countries to store gold with China, according to people familiar with the matter, marking early progress in Beijing’s push to develop as a global bullion hub.】

item.title: 阿联酋石油巨头倚重美国专业知识，"有望 "转向页岩油田
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国长期以来一直是欧佩克（OPEC）的主要石油生产国之一，它正在转向采用经过美国测试的压裂技术来开发其 "非常有前途的 "非常规天然气资源，目的是在预测需求激增的情况下提高产量。【原文：The United Arab Emirates, long one of OPEC’s key oil producers, is pivoting to US-tested fracking techniques to tap its “very promising” unconventional gas resources, with the intention of ramping up output amid forecasts for surging demand.】

item.title: 史上最长停摆令美国经济每周损失约 150 亿美元
item.description:
过去的停机只会留下暂时的伤痕，但这次不同

。【原文：

Past shutdowns have left only temporary scars, but this time is different

】

item.title: AI 股市中的消费类股票在即将发布的财报中表现不佳
item.description: 2025 年股市屡创新高，但有一类股票却远远落在后面：消费品供应商。本周将有一大批大型公司发布财报，投资者将面临更多的痛苦。【原文：For all the stock market records notched in 2025, there’s one class of stock that’s lagging far behind: purveyors of consumer products. Investors are bracing for more pain as a host of the largest companies deliver earnings reports this week.】

item.title: 加纳通胀率创四年新低，为大幅降息铺平道路
item.description: 加纳的通货膨胀率降至四年多来的最低点，为进一步降低借贷成本提供了空间。【原文：Ghana’s inflation rate fell to the lowest in more than four years, providing scope for a further reduction in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 泰国正在追捕泰铢异常坚挺背后的 "灰色资金
item.description: 泰国政府将成立一个特别小组，追踪与网络赌博、诈骗账户和其他 "灰色资金 "交易有关的可疑资金流动。【原文：The Thai government will set up a special team to track suspicious fund movements linked to online gambling, scam accounts, and other “gray money” transactions.】

item.title: 关税担忧令买家望而却步，多伦多房屋销售下滑
item.description: 由于加拿大与美国贸易战的不确定性导致买家和卖家都缩手缩脚，多伦多 10 月份的房屋销售量有所下降。【原文：Toronto home sales fell in October as uncertainty about Canada’s trade war with the US caused both buyers and sellers to pull back.】

item.title: 软银在日本公司利用 OpenAI 追求实际收入
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp. ）的日本移动业务部门和 OpenAI 将于明年为本地公司推出人工智能服务，在人们日益担心估值过高的情况下寻求实现实际收入。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s Japanese mobile unit and OpenAI will launch AI services for local companies next year, seeking to realize real revenue in the face of growing concerns over sky-high valuations.】

item.title: 赞比亚和坦桑尼亚之间的非洲铜贸易要道重新开通
item.description: 坦桑尼亚重新开放了与赞比亚的边境，恢复了非洲两个最大铜出口国的重要贸易走廊的货物流通，上周大选后的动乱导致货运停滞。【原文：Tanzania has reopened its border with Zambia, restoring cargo flows along a key trade corridor for Africa’s two biggest copper exporters after post-election unrest brought consignments to a standstill last week.】

item.title: 美国股市涨势暂歇，全球股市取得历史性优异表现
item.description: 一年前，由于唐纳德-特朗普承诺提高关税和减税，投资者确信如果他赢得总统大选，国际股市将注定跑输美国股市。一年后，他们却对全球股市爱不释手。【原文：A year ago, investors were sure that a presidential win for Donald Trump would doom international stocks to underperform the US market due to his promises to ratchet up tariffs and cut taxes. A year later, they can’t get enough of global equities.】

item.title: 尼日利亚开始发行欧洲债券，寻求筹资 22.5 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚开始出售基准美元债务，与其他非洲发行国一道利用较低的借贷成本。【原文：Nigeria began a sale of benchmark dollar debt, joining other African issuers taking advantage of lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 油价上涨，油轮 "变脏"，抛弃燃料改用原油
item.description: 运输石油的油轮运费飙升，促使大量船只加入这一利润丰厚的行业，数十艘船只将重点从运输产品转向在世界各大洋上运输原油。【原文：A spike in freight rates for tankers hauling oil has prompted a wave of vessels to join the lucrative trade, with dozens of ships switching their focus from hauling products to carrying crude across the world’s oceans.】

item.title: 英伟达为何是人工智能芯片之王？
item.description: 自 2022 年生成式人工智能开始成为头条新闻以来，投资者纷纷将资金投入 Nvidia 公司，坚信其在人工智能硬件领域的领先地位将带来财富。【原文：Since generative artificial intelligence began to make headlines in 2022, investors have poured money into Nvidia Corp., convinced that its leading position in AI hardware will deliver riches.】

item.title: 鲨鱼宝宝 "创作者 Pinkfong 在韩国首次公开募股中筹资 5300 万美元
item.description: The Pinkfong Company Inc. 的首次公开募股定价达到了市场预期的最高价，为这家韩国公司募集到了 760 亿韩元（5300 万美元）的资金。【原文：The Pinkfong Company Inc. priced its initial public offering at the top of its marketed range, raising 76 billion won ($53 million) for the South Korean company behind the “Baby Shark” jingle, the most-watched YouTube video of all time.】

item.title: 经济复苏势头强劲，瑞典央行维持利率不变
item.description: 瑞典中央银行将借贷成本维持在三年来的最低水平，并继续发出停滞约一年的信号，以便让新生的经济复苏站稳脚跟。【原文：Sweden’s central bank kept borrowing costs at a three-year low and continued to signal a standstill of about a year to allow a nascent economic recovery to take hold.】

item.title: 据说化肥公司将利用银行进行至关重要的阿曼首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿曼印度化肥公司（Oman India Fertiliser Co.【原文：Oman India Fertiliser Co. has picked banks for a potential initial public offering in Muscat, according to people familiar with the matter, as the sultanate revives efforts to privatize state assets and deepen its capital markets.】

item.title: 需求持续增长，英伟达服务器制造商鸿海销售额增长 11
item.description: 由于对人工智能加速器的需求依然强劲，服务器制造商鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Nvidia Corp. server-maker Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. posted an 11.3% gain in October revenue, sustaining its pace of growth as demand for AI accelerators remains robust.】
